You mentioned the apple commercials. I want to point out something about the new Ipad commercial. It says "When a screen becomes this good" is very strange and apple like wording. This wording says to me that they don't even want to give the people that made the screen recognition. It should have been worded "When a screen is made this good" which would say it was made by people. Using the word "become" makes it sound like it miraculously out of magic (not by peoples hands) became better. Its all psychology and how apple wants people to perceive their stuff and apple wants it to seem like magic made it and not human beings who sweat and Bleed making their stuff.
